module.p: -mhor is a suffix used to create derived adjectives from common nouns.

Examples –
àgh joy, luck ⇒ àghmhor joyful
ceòl music ⇒ ceòlmhor melodious
lìon ⇒ lìonmhor abundant, copious, numerous
mì-àgh infelicity ⇒ mì-àghmhor infelicitous
mì-shealbh misfortune ⇒ mì-shealbhmhor unsuccessful (also mì-shealbhar)
mì-thlachd displeasure ⇒ mì-thlachdmhor unpleasant, disagreeable
neart strength ⇒ neartmhor powerful
sealbh fortune ⇒ sealbhmhor prosperous
sìol seed ⇒ sìolmhor fruitful
